{{Wired embedded system |brand=Edgewater Networks |model=EdgeMarc 4700 |asin=B00VO82KSW |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=04/2015 |type=router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.33 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=P1020E |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F512M29EWH |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646Q-BCK0 |jtag=yes,, 16-pin header,, unpopulated,, JP2 |serial=yes,, console port,, DE-9,, (9600 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211DS |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model=RTL8211DS |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8370M |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=I2C Real Time Clock;Intersil;ISL12026;;1;,,, PCI Express Clock;Pericom;PI6C557-05;;1;,,, 4Kb I2C Serial EEPROM;On Semi;CAV24C04;;1;,,, 2 Channel RS232 Interface;Analog Devices;ADM3202;;1;,,, 16-bit D-type Transparent Latch w/ 3-State In/Out;NXP;74LVC16373A;;1;,,, Digital DC/DC Controller w/ Auto Compensation;Intersil;ZL6105;;1;,,, <!-- Digital DC/DC Controller with Drivers;Zilker;ZL6105;;1;,,, --> 30V N-Channel Power MOSFET;Infineon;BSC020N03MS;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel Power MOSFET;Infineon;BSC080N03MS;;1;,,, 3-State Octal Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;LVC244A;;1; |flags=SD Card slot, heatsink, metal case, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2013.01;V1.1.0; |stock_os=Linux;3.8.13;-rt9; |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=default |oui_eth=54:39:68 }} {{TagLine|EdgeMarc 4700 Enterprise Session Border Controller}} :[ftp://ftp.edgewaternetworks.com/pub/docs/EdgeMarc/4700/EM4700_HIG.pdf Hardware Installation Guide]
*SD/SDHC/MMC Card slot
